channel.title: When im coding a server i need to manualy start a new line
channel.description:
Okay il copy a code with like new lines and stuff from each start of the code. And when i paste it in a file, it will appear like this: [code]//Duelingpublic String duelOpponent = "null";public boolean IncomingRequest = false;public client IncomingReqClient;public client blankClient;public String IncomingReqName = "null";public boolean inDuelOptions = false;public client inDuelOpponent;public boolean Accepted = false;public boolean armourEnabled = true;public boolean meleeEnabled = true;public boolean rangedEnabled = true;public boolean magicEnabled = true;public boolean specEnabled = true;public boolean forfeitEnabled = true;public boolean drinksEnabled = true;public boolean foodEnabled = true;public boolean prayerEnabled = true;public boolean movementEnabled = true;public void DuelingInterface(client opponent) { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Dueling with: " + opponent.playerName, 6575); showInterface(6575); flushOutStream(); for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { duelEquipment(playerEquipment[i], playerEquipmentN[i], i); }}public void SendDuelRequest(client cDuel) { I[/code]
Okay i just want to know how too make it paste exactly what i copy.
